headline: Ralph Lauren’s (RL) CEO is Doing a Remarkable Job, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) is a well-known American apparel firm known for its brands such as Polo and Purple Label. The shares are up by 27.5% over the past year but are down […]

headline: How The Ralph Lauren RL Narrative Is Shifting With New Targets And Fair Value Assumptions
summary: What Is Driving the New Fair Value Range for Ralph Lauren? Recent research has shifted the fair value estimate for Ralph Lauren from about US$369.46 to roughly US$403.58 per share, reflecting fresh views on how the story could play out from here. Analysts pointing to a "surprisingly strong" retail backdrop, easier year on year comparisons, tax refund support for consumer spending, and disciplined inventory trends are helping justify a higher target range, even as they keep demand uncertainty...
